pageContext.claim: “Earnings for the bottom 10% are rising faster than earnings for the top 10%, first time ever.”
pageContext.analysis: Our colleagues at PolitiFact looked into this claim and found it to be dubious: "Earnings for the bottom 10% seem to be rising faster, but not by much, and there are different ways to crunch the data. Also, the weekly earnings measure misses a lot of income at the high end and produces an artificially low estimate for the top 10%. It is a poor measure for the comparison Trump made."
